title: Log in issues???
body: Can anyone log in lmao.... started like 10 mins ago

replies.body:
Hi folks,

Thanks for flagging the issue here - I've just put up an [announcement thread](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/kbVzswc0-login-issues-4th-feb-2016) to keep you updated.    Hopefully we'll have you back on the rift shortly!

Cheers
Mindstar
Im now able to get on League however its not connecting me to the chatrooms so i can't chat with anyone or even see my friends list, Do you know whats up with that?
Thank you! :D
I called in sick for nothing!
I'm actually sick but i agree!! Haha.
I'm actually sick but i agree!! Haha.
hahahahaha
LMFAO

Yeah happening to me too.. tf

[img]http://i.imgur.com/ClBLrkH.jpg[/img]

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Zaps,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=9rNOyg9Q,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-02-02T05:52:50.915+0000)
>
> We're currently aware that there are issues with attempting to log on, starting games and end of games. We're investigating this issue and will update this thread with more information when possible.
> 
> **UPDATES:**
> 
> **5:05 PM AEDT** - The issues with logging on to the game have been resolved - and ranked is no longer disabled.


@Riot Zaps I don't think the issue's resolved yet e.e pls help us all
how long until the problem is fixed
i still got issues with loggin in grr {{champion:32}}
i cant go on anymore. my life.. is incomplete, this is a world with out league and i dont wanna live in it

Maybe rito just had a list of the best players and decided to ban us from the server for today, to allow all the other players to have a chance at winning today. 

Just kidding - I'm pretty horrible.

Same issue though :D
It's official im moving to N.A http://ih0.redbubble.net/image.38871995.9911/raf,750x1000,075,t,black.u1.jpg

Same here, can't login, tries a bunch of times and then times out.

Why does the server status page say everything is fine if so many people are having issues?

I thought my internet was just playing up xD

I also cant log in, not to mention i cant log onto my OCE website account? riot pls halp

ALSO... its been over an hour since this thread was made surely a rioter could give some feedback, unless ur too busy counting all the money u earn from RP
i know the feels, but u can still log into them on the riot page, which is a relief in a way ;p but not on here =[ but yeah still cant get into the game =[
the only thing left to do is have a wank, if it's still not up... god help us all T_T

Gotta love the fact no one can log in. Yay. I woke up an hour ago and decided for once I'm not going to sleep in I'm going to improve my K/D ratio. For once I wish I went back to sleep. :c {{summoner:11}} the damn errors!
UPDATE: I can log into my NA Account but not my OCE... -_-
NA party time woohoo
Haha feels like that's the only thing to do :D

Same here. Tried my other account as well, same thing.
Yeah can't get in either, server just randomly dropped after game, how can I play Chris Kyle now

I can't login either, been trying for like 30 minutes.

"Did not receive response from server; retrying. (attempt 1)"
"Did not receive response from server; retrying. (attempt 2)"
"Did not receive response from server; retrying. (attempt 3)"

Then displays the login error....

Working fine now.

Life is restored!
What do i do with my day now im so lost.{{summoner:7}} me rioto
SAY SOMETHING riot! we need to feel thats it not just us that can't login and that you know the problem exists and are whipping the yordles to work faster!
The Network Operations Center is working on it. Hopefully, they'll be able to fix this ;)

At horrific times like these we can only be together and stay strong.

May Riot help us all.
im having the same problem -.-
Riot can u guys please fix this issue. Thanks.
